RelatedSentence: Thiruvananthapuram : Drawing inspiration from the Kochi - Muziris Biennale , the district administration in Kerala capital is getting ready to turn the walls of public buildings here into canvas for artists .
Authorities have drawn up a plan to paint beautiful pictures on the walls of the city buildings , mostly the government offices , with the help of artists .
The project is also meant to preserve the traditional charm of the city , the walls of whose buildings are defaced by ugly graffitis and film posters , a top official said .
The project is also meant to preserve the traditional charm of the city , the walls of whose buildings are defaced by ugly graffitis and film posters , a top official said .
The graffitis and wall posters have largely taken their toll on the beauty of heritage buildings in the city .
Seeking to check this menace , we are planning to paint pictures on the walls of selected buildings here , District Collector Biju Prabhakar told PTI .
